messages.content: Here is a link as an example of how you could adjust your tongue weight to fit your needs. https://youtu.be/RRo_yxwo-hA

Hmm okay. You may already know this so if I do I apologize but the tongue weight or hitch weight is variable depending on how you pack your trailer and where because it is how the weight is balanced on the wheel. There is a dry hitch weight which I dont know anymore because of remodels but it isn't much of a guarantee.
2000 but the hitch weight has to be 200 or less.
Ok, thank you.  I have to know the exact weight of the unit and hitch.  I have a very limited amount that I am able to tow.
Don't know the exact weight but when I bought it it was 1480. After some remodeling it is probably close to 1600 or 1700
Sarah is waiting for your response.
Do you know the hitch weight, and also do this have a toilet?
